citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:52 pm on
20-DEC-16.
We spoke to the licensee who stated no responsible adult was available for inspection.
Additionally we were at your facility on 19-December-2106, at 3:28 pm, and no responsible adult was available.
We knocked on the door, contacted the phone number provided and waited 40 minutes and no responsible adult
was available for inspection.
USPS Tracking#: 9590940100245071529022
Additional Inspectors
Ranslem Corbin, Animal Care Inspector
